title: Nmap - Reconnaissance
content:
Tool: Nmap
Category: Reconnaissance
Description: Network discovery and security auditing tool

Common Commands:

nmap -sV -sC target
  └─ Service version detection with default scripts

nmap -p- -T4 target
  └─ Full port scan with timing template 4

nmap -sU -p 53,161 target
  └─ UDP scan on specific ports

nmap --script vuln target
  └─ Run vulnerability scripts

nmap -sn 192.168.1.0/24
  └─ Ping sweep for host discovery


Usage Guidelines:
- Always verify authorization before testing
- Start with less intrusive options
- Document all findings
- Consider detection implications

OPSEC Considerations:
- Nmap may trigger security alerts
- Use appropriate timing and rate limiting
- Consider logging and evidence
- Clean up artifacts after testing
